edu.cmu.heinz.ij95713.Bank

Class BankServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.heinz.ij95713.Bank.BankServer

  • public class BankServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Yujie BankServer class has an arrayList object to store all accounts from the input file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankServer()
      Constructor initialize the accounts list and invoke the loadAccounts method to read the input file.

      Invoke withdraw() method on the account if exits.
      boolean verifyFnds(java.lang.String cardNumber, double amount)
      Searches for the account if exists and make sure its balance is greater than or equal to the amount.

      Verify the pin for the account
